Dubai World Trade Centre
(DWTC)

Prices starting fromAED 5,750

Dubai World Trade Centre holds a huge reputation among foreign investors and big corporations. DWTC free zone offers a well-regulated ecosystem that allows companies to grow and flourish globally. DWTC houses more than 350 companies and 40 industries. The iconic location allows companies to access the world-class trade events. The Dubai World Trade Centre is classified as a free zone, and we can help you with free zone company setup DWTC.

A&A Associate ensure quick and cheapest company incorporation or business setup in the DWTC. The free zone offers its clients with executive offices, flexi-desk and other facilities according to your requirements. It’s incredibly connected via Dubai metro and other road networks. Easily accessible from Dubai international airport and Dubai international financial centre!

DWTC location highlights

DWTC is a centrally located free zone with cost-effective business setup options. Situated in the heart of Dubai, it’s close to the World trade center. The trade center is a famous hotspot for conducting various global exhibitions. It’s also surrounded by the most prestigious Burj Khalifa, Emirates tower, and DIFC.
Being located in close proximity with the Dubai world trade center, the companies get access to international or global events.

Freezone Locations

  • JAFZA
  • DMCC
  • DWTC
  • IFZA DSO
  • Sharjah Media City
  • Sharjah Publishing City
  • SAIF Zone
  • RAKEZ
  • Ajman Media City
  • Fujairah Creative City
  • JAFZA
  • DMCC
  • DWTC
  • IFZA DSO
  • Sharjah Media City
  • Sharjah Publishing City
  • SAIF Zone
  • RAKEZ
  • Ajman Media City
  • Fujairah Creative City

What are the benefits of free zone company setup DWTC?

  • Situated in the heart of Dubai
  • Complete ownership
  • Full repatriation of profits and capitals
  • No restriction on currency and fund transfer
  • Easy to hire foreign employees
  • No export tax
  • Easy to combine onshore and offshore operations
  • Multiple options for legal operating structures
  • Clear and stable regulation
  • No corporate and income tax for 50 years
  • Highly-flexible work space
  • Modern infrastructure
  • Close proximity to world-class events

What are the different types of licensing in DWTC?

General trading license
This allows all business activities including export, import, and distribution.
Commercial license
This allows carrying out commercial activities that include export, import, sale, store, and distribute items permitted under the issued license.
Professional license
Under professional license, the business owners can perform activities listed under the license. Few typical services include onsite repair, consulting, advisory, HR, software, and other implementation services.
Event management license
Under event license, you can organize leisure or any business events, incentives, conferences, and exhibitions.

What are the different legal entities under DWTC?

DWTC business setup provides a suitable business structure for individual investors and corporate shareholders.

DWTC has the following legal entities,

  • Free zone establishment – FZE entity is owned by a single shareholder, it can be an individual or shareholder holding 100% shares of the company.
  • Free zone Company – FZC has a minimum of 2 or more shareholders.
  • Branch of a foreign company – It can be registered as a branch of your company in DWTC without any capital investment.

What are the documents required for business setup in DWTC?

  • DWTC application form
  • Business plan
  • Copy of passport
  • Copy of Emirates ID
  • Profile of shareholder
  • Board resolution to start a company
  • MoA and AoA of the parent company, duly attested by concerned authorities
  • Certificate of good conduct
  • License copy of parent company

What is the process of free zone company setup DWTC?

After selecting the legal structure and type of license, now understand the process to setup your business in DWTC.

  • Choose your trade name
  • Select a legal structure
  • Submit your application
  • Get initial approval from DWTC free zone authority
  • Submit all the relevant documents
  • Get the lease and license
  • Start your business functioning

Why Choose A&A Associate LLC for Free Zone Company Setup DWTC?

We offer one of the best and reputed business setup services in UAE. DWTC is a dream home for entrepreneurs, with exciting business opportunities and unique features of its own.

 

With extensive experience in business setup, we guide investors or shareholders who wish to establish their business in DWTC, our highly-qualified business setup consultants offer end-to-end solutions to business owners or other enterprises searching for the best free zone jurisdiction to setup their businesses.

 

Streamline your business in UAE’s largest venue with the help of A&A Associate business setup consultants!
